TempStable 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • my-vignette
  • Changelog

    Function to generate random variates of the TSS distribution.

    rTSS.Rd

    Generates n random numbers distributed according of the tempered stable subordinator distribution.

    rTSS(
  n,
  alpha = NULL,
  delta = NULL,
  lambda = NULL,
  theta = NULL,
  method = "AR",
  k = 10000
)

    Arguments

    n

    sample size (integer).

    alpha

    Stability parameter. A real number between 0 and 1.

    delta

    Scale parameter. A real number > 0.

    lambda

    Tempering parameter. A real number > 0.

    theta

    Parameters stacked as a vector.

    method

    A String. Either "AR" or "SR".

    k

    integer: the level of truncation, if method == "SR". 10000 by default.

    Value

    Generates n random numbers.

    Details

    theta denotes the parameter vector (alpha, delta, lambda). Either provide the parameters alpha, delta, lambda individually OR provide theta. "AR" stands for the Acceptance-Rejection Method and "SR" for a truncated infinite shot noise series representation. "AR" is the standard method used. For more details, see references.

    References

    Massing, Till (2022), 'Parametric Estimation of Tempered Stable Laws'

    Kawai, R & Masuda, H (2011), 'On simulation of tempered stable random variates' doi:10.1016/j.cam.2010.12.014

    Examples

    rTSS(100,0.5,1,1)
#>   [1] 1.5302088 2.6056943 0.8301812 1.5853036 3.4020800 0.7600959 2.9988932
#>   [8] 0.9385657 0.6277222 2.0333299 1.3016222 5.2774787 0.4148700 1.8705548
#>  [15] 1.1640652 3.1729450 0.7453909 1.6568762 0.7971433 2.8276063 1.5566001
#>  [22] 4.6145251 2.3893250 1.2918153 0.7836403 3.3570780 1.1391125 1.9216217
#>  [29] 2.3810154 1.7117929 2.1225409 0.9999421 2.1057885 1.3309929 3.7576552
#>  [36] 1.8000374 0.9377894 1.2969732 1.5709549 2.2486015 1.5100974 0.8161351
#>  [43] 1.1850592 0.9548262 1.3041879 2.3247166 1.9307976 1.2208660 2.7954317
#>  [50] 2.4738778 4.0803611 4.9436973 1.3029090 1.9370419 0.9554760 1.4976961
#>  [57] 1.9983303 1.8746022 0.6828149 0.8024045 0.5338475 0.8989530 1.9150704
#>  [64] 2.5249530 3.0359132 1.0245741 3.3871340 2.6398427 3.1417410 0.7302338
#>  [71] 1.9748808 1.1205770 0.6896968 0.8724898 1.7967385 2.5552419 1.7287578

#>  [85] 0.7635592 0.9996157 1.7522377 1.7919300 0.6125549 2.9473181 2.2672055
#>  [92] 3.1440616 1.2472971 1.1793720 1.9920625 2.4421837 2.8592111 2.1452799
#>  [99] 0.4356478 1.2342742
